subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Maracanã Stadium in Rio de Janeiro reopened after lengthy renovations, with Paulinho scoring on an 82nd-minute volley to give Brazil a 2-2 tie against England in an exhibition.
snippet: Maracanã Stadium in Rio de Janeiro reopened after lengthy renovations, with Paulinho scoring on an 82nd-minute volley to give Brazil a 2-2 tie against England in an exhibition.
